response.overview: Sire – 8122 73344 2, Warner Bros. Records – 8122 73344 2, Rhino Records (2) – 8122 73344 2, Warner Strategic Marketing – 8122 73344 2 CD, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo DVD, DVD-Audio, Multichannel, Album, Stereo Europe 16 янв. 2006 г. Electronic, Rock Synth-pop, Indie Rock, Music Video DVD features the original album in 5.1 Surround Sound and Dolby Stereo, advanced resolution 96khz/24bit surround & stereo sound, a photo gallery, two bonus promo videos and Burning Down The House (Alternate 5.1 Mix) - a new mix created during the remastering sessions. In addition, both CD and DVD play the extended versions of "Making Flippy Floppy," "Girlfriend is Better," "Slippery People," "I Get Wild," and "Moon Rocks" originally featured on the original cassette and the 2nd CD edition.
response.title: Talking Heads - Speaking In Tongues - 1983 (DVD-Audio)
